CustomField.formula: (TEXT( Line_Of_Business__c ) = $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Life_Safety_LOB__c || TEXT( Line_Of_Business__c ) = $Setup.Field_Service_Settings__c.Hygiene_LOB__c) && NOT(isInstallation__c) && NOT(isDelivery__c) && NOT(FSL__Emergency__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Missed Service"))
CustomField.label: isHygiene/LifeSafety
